name: Ebury Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night. We had a lovely room overlooking the large garden. The room was vey spacious and had recently been refurbished to a high standard. We took up the special offer which included dinner. The food was excellent and the staff efficient and friendly. This hotel is situated about ten minuites flat walk from the City centre.
reviews.title: Good value
A Lovely Place To Stay In Canterbury Kent
reviews.text: I visited Canterbury from 15th-22nd Sept.2007 with my wife and son and stayed in a self -catered COTTAGE of the EBURY HOTEL.

description: Ebury Hotel is located a short walk from Canterbury city centre and the cathedral, this 15 bedroom elegant Victorian building is situated in its own gardens. All bedrooms are ensuite, and have Sky tv channels, flat screen tvs, free broadband wireless internet, and welcome trays. The double rooms all have kingsize beds. Family rooms are available. Facilities include a large free carpark, indoor heated pool, restaurant, and gardens. Self-catering cottages are available on weekly lets.
